Producer: Jack Black, Stuart Cornfield, Kyle Gass
Screenwriter: Jack Black, Kyle Gass, Liam Lynch
Synopsis: Musicians JB (Jack Black) and KG (Kyle Gass) begin a friendship that could lead to the formation of the greatest rock band in the world. To make that dream come true, the righteous duo embark on a quest to find a legendary guitar pick that possesses supernatural powers.
Title: Tenacious D in: The Pick of Destiny
